markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Garrote Shot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2051)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Wiry designs mark the silvery coating on a _garrote shot_. When the activated ammunition hits a target, it transforms into a silvery garrote that wraps around one of the target's appendages, dealing 2d12 [persistent slashing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). On a critical hit, it wraps around the target's throat if it has one, and the target [can't breathe](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) until the persistent damage ends. If the persistent damage kills the target, the garrote severs the appendage it's wrapped around.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Garrote Shot

When the activated ammunition hits a target, it transforms into a silvery garrote that wraps around one of the target's appendages, dealing 2d12 persistent slashing damage. On a critical hit, it wraps around the target's throat if it has one, and the target can't breathe until the persistent damage ends. If the persistent damage kills the target, the garrote severs the appendage it's wrapped around.
